title: Daily added sugar intake in England in 2008 - 2012 , by age group
summary: This bar chart has 5 categories for the x axis representing Age Group, and a y axis representing Sugar intake in grams.
The highest category is found at Teenagers_11-18_years where Sugar intake in grams is 74.2.
The lowest category is found at Children_1.5-3_years where Sugar intake in grams is 36.1.
